description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Early access games for those who want to help me with large playtests. The game included will change monthly, ranging from small prototypes to network beta tests. The games will be incomplete and ugly. All progress you make will be lost when the application updates and will not be transferred to the final game. If you expect a complete game experience: DO NOT BUY THIS.
